attributes.title: Horrible experience
attributes.review: This apps made me wanna do bad things, it’s a really bad app owned by bad people, this shouldn’t even exist please delete this, PLEASE BAN THIS APP FOR NATIONAL SAFETY. When I installed this app me and my kids broke our legs! It also steals information from you. It brainwashes you into believing whatever orange man says. Please stay away from this app, save yourself.

attributes.title: Phone problem
attributes.review: I downloaded this app after my phone stared to glitch and I thought it was my phone for a second and all of a sudden my phone turned off so I thought there’s was a problem with this app and I deleted this app and turns out it was this app.

attributes.title: Miraculous Cheeto with corn hair😭😭
attributes.review:
If you’re reading this that means you’re here to listen to my story.

Water 🌊
Earth 🌏 
Fire 🔥 
Air 💨
Long ago😌, the 4 nations 👅lived together in harmony🤝. Then everything changed😯 when the fire nation 🔥attacked😡. ONLY the avatar 🤭master of all 4 elements🌝, could stop them🙇‍♀️. But when the world🌏 needed him most ☹️he vanished🕴. A hundred years passed👵🏻 and my brother🙆🏻‍♂️ and I 💁🏻‍♀️discovered the new avatar🧚‍♂️ an air bender🌬 named AANG🥊. And although his air 🌪bending skills are great👌. He has a lot to learn 🤓before he’s ready ✅to save anyone⚠️. But I believe✝️ AANG can save the world.🌈🌍🐡🐳

attributes.title: white trash
attributes.review: i didn’t want to believe the awful reviews of this app since i am a loyal white supremacist 🤪🤪 but the app somehow detected that i was an asian immigrant and started to go all bonkers!!!😫🤬  how am i suppose to show my support to my favorite cheeto puff now?? it started to send me notifications about GO BACK TO CHINA and calling me the KUNG FLU 💔💔trump trump my heart go thump thump 😔😔✊🏼✊🏼💔💔💔

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: When I first open this app I was blinded by the most hideous image 😭😭😭 a deformed cheeto wearing a wig 🤢🤢🤮 excuse me but donald purposely trying to replace himself with a cheeto and thinking he had us fooled 🗿?? No sir not today this is offensive to cheetos !!  Bc really? I with everything going on right now??🙅🏻‍♀️🙅🏻‍♀️🙅🏻‍♀️ My eyes will never heal from this and my mind will never forget 😔✌🏼

attributes.title: Terrible Bad App
attributes.review: Although I absolutely love Trump so very much and do not hate him at all not even one bit, this app is terrible. I’m not quite sure what this app is even used for considering that I didn’t open it before writing this review but i can still say with certainty that it’s a bad app. 1 star review it is🧚

attributes.title: DO NOT GET
attributes.review: I just downloaded and my phone starting yelling racist and sexist slurs im scared for my life and others who have downloaded. This is a serious issue which must be taken care of. A threat to human kind. This app will completely destroy your phone and stalk you when youre not even on it !!!!!!!! THEY ARE LISTENING TO EVERYTHING YOU SAY AND CAN SEE YOU !!!! DELETE THIS.

attributes.title: AWFUL my phone now works awful.
attributes.review: I tried to plug my phone in after downloading this app and now it well not charge. I also asked my dog how he liked it and he also gave it a one star. And my dog normally likes most apps so the app rly does have to be trash. And a rat crawled out of my phone which was very scary.

attributes.title: don’t waste your time!😡
attributes.review: I was so excited to get this app and see all of the wonderful things I could do to support Mr. Trump’s campaign but all I found was bigotry😞 it’s really disappointing that the president has to pay for himself to win this election through desperate social media post and bad apps like this. do better.

attributes.title: ITS HORRIFIC 🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review: Before I download this app my house was fine but then when I downloaded it my refrigerator got stolen and my kitchen was full of ketchup and it said that Donald Duck was the worst character in Mickey Mouse so this is obviously a horrible app because it tells you lies about Mickey Mouse characters and it ruins your whole house. This cheeto puff ruined my life 🤢🤮😭.
